statement:
(
    select
        `activity`.`id`,
        `activity`.`opporid`,
        `activity`.`category`,
        `details`.`name`,
        `details`.`company`,
        `activity`.`alertpic`,
        `activity`.`datetime` as `start`,
        `activity`.`end_datetime` as `end`,
        `activity`.`notes` as `description`,
        `status`.`color`,
        `status`.`id` as `status_id`,
        IF(
            ABS(
                TIMESTAMPDIFF(
                    DAY,
                    `activity`.`datetime`,
                    `activity`.`end_datetime`
                )
            ) > 0,
            1,
            0
        ) as `is_long`
    from
        `activity`
        left join `opportunities` on `opportunities`.`id` = `activity`.`opporid`
        left join `details` on `details`.`id` = `opportunities`.`customer_id`
        left join `status` on `status`.`id` = `activity`.`status`
        right join (
            (
                SELECT
                    DISTINCT U1.ref_id
                FROM
                    uses_permissions AS U1
                    LEFT JOIN activity as A1 ON (A1.id = U1.ref_id)
                    INNER JOIN uses_permissions AS P2 ON U1.ref_id = P2.ref_id
                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                WHERE
                    U1.profileid IN (1200)
                    AND U1.parentid = 6
                    AND U1.type = 'activity'
                    AND U1.current_permission = 2
                    AND A1.parentid = 6
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND (
                        A1.datetime <= '2022-12-19 23:59:59'
                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-19 00:00:00'
                    )
            )
            UNION
            (
                SELECT
                    DISTINCT U1.ref_id
                FROM
                    global_permissions AS U1
                    LEFT JOIN activity AS A2 ON (A2.id = U1.ref_id)
                    INNER JOIN uses_permissions AS P2 ON U1.ref_id = P2.ref_id
                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                WHERE
                    U1.profileid IN (11980)
                    AND U1.parentid = 6
                    AND U1.type = 'activity'
                    AND U1.current_permission = 2
                    AND A2.parentid = 6
                    AND A2.isactive = 1
                    AND (
                        A2.datetime <= '2022-12-19 23:59:59'
                        AND A2.end_datetime >= '2022-12-19 00:00:00'
                    )
            )
        ) as `subaup` on `subaup`.`ref_id` = `activity`.`id`
        right join (
            (
                SELECT
                    DISTINCT main_sql.ref_id
                FROM
                    uses_permissions as main_sql
                    INNER JOIN uses_permissions AS P2 ON main_sql.ref_id = P2.ref_id
                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                    LEFT JOIN activity as A1 ON (A1.id = main_sql.ref_id)
                WHERE
                    main_sql.parentid = 6
                    AND main_sql.type = 'activity'
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND A1.parentid = 6
                    AND (
                        A1.datetime <= '2022-12-19 23:59:59'
                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-19 00:00:00'
                    )
                    AND (
                        (
                            main_sql.type = 'activity'
                            AND main_sql.current_permission != 0
                            AND main_sql.profileid IN (1200)
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql.deal_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    uses_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    uses_permissions.type = 'deal'
                                    AND uses_permissions.ref_id = main_sql.deal_id
                                    AND uses_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND uses_permissions.profileid IN (1200)
                            )
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql.customer_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    uses_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    uses_permissions.type = 'customer'
                                    AND uses_permissions.ref_id = main_sql.customer_id
                                    AND uses_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND uses_permissions.profileid IN (1200)
                            )
                        )
                    )
            )
            UNION
            (
                SELECT
                    DISTINCT main_sql_dept.ref_id
                FROM
                    global_permissions as main_sql_dept
                    INNER JOIN uses_permissions AS P2 ON main_sql_dept.ref_id = P2.ref_id
                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                    LEFT JOIN activity AS A1 ON (A1.id = main_sql_dept.ref_id)
                WHERE
                    main_sql_dept.parentid = 6
                    AND main_sql_dept.type = 'activity'
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND A1.parentid = 6
                    AND (
                        A1.datetime <= '2022-12-19 23:59:59'
                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-19 00:00:00'
                    )
                    AND (
                        (
                            main_sql_dept.type = 'activity'
                            AND main_sql_dept.current_permission != 0
                            AND main_sql_dept.profileid IN (11980)
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql_dept.deal_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    global_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    global_permissions.type = 'deal'
                                    AND global_permissions.ref_id = main_sql_dept.deal_id
                                    AND global_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND global_permissions.profileid IN (11980)
                            )
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql_dept.customer_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    global_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    global_permissions.type = 'customer'
                                    AND global_permissions.ref_id = main_sql_dept.customer_id
                                    AND global_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND global_permissions.profileid IN (11980)
                            )
                        )
                    )
            )
        ) as `subaccessq` on `subaccessq`.`ref_id` = `activity`.`id`
    where
        `activity`.`isactive` = 1
        and (1 = 1)
        and `activity`.`parentid` = 6
    order by
        IF(
            ABS(
                TIMESTAMPDIFF(
                    DAY,
                    `activity`.`datetime`,
                    `activity`.`end_datetime`
                )
            ) > 0,
            1,
            0
        ) DESC,
        activity.datetime DESC,
        activity.id DESC
    limit
        7 offset 0
)
union
(
    select
        `activity`.`id`,
        `activity`.`opporid`,
        `activity`.`category`,
        `details`.`name`,
        `details`.`company`,
        `activity`.`alertpic`,
        `activity`.`datetime` as `start`,
        `activity`.`end_datetime` as `end`,
        `activity`.`notes` as `description`,

        IF(
            ABS(
                TIMESTAMPDIFF(
                    DAY,
                    `activity`.`datetime`,
                    `activity`.`end_datetime`
                )
            ) > 0,
            1,
            0

    from
        `activity`

        left join `details` on `details`.`id` = `opportunities`.`customer_id`
        left join `status` on `status`.`id` = `activity`.`status`
        right join (
            (

                    uses_permissions AS U1

                    AND P2.parentid = 6

                    AND P2.current_permission = 2

                WHERE
                    U1.profileid IN (1200)
                    AND U1.parentid = 6
                    AND U1.type = 'activity'
                    AND U1.current_permission = 2

                    AND (

                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-20 00:00:00'
                    )
            )
            UNION
            (
                SELECT
                    DISTINCT U1.ref_id
                FROM

                    LEFT JOIN activity AS A2 ON (A2.id = U1.ref_id)
                    INNER JOIN uses_permissions AS P2 ON U1.ref_id = P2.ref_id
                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                WHERE
                    U1.profileid IN (11980)
                    AND U1.parentid = 6

                    AND U1.current_permission = 2

                    AND A2.isactive = 1

                        AND A2.end_datetime >= '2022-12-20 00:00:00'

                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                    LEFT JOIN activity as A1 ON (A1.id = main_sql.ref_id)
                WHERE
                    main_sql.parentid = 6
                    AND main_sql.type = 'activity'
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND A1.parentid = 6
                    AND (
                        A1.datetime <= '2022-12-20 23:59:59'
                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-20 00:00:00'
                    )
                    AND (
                        (
                            main_sql.type = 'activity'
                            AND main_sql.current_permission != 0
                            AND main_sql.profileid IN (1200)
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql.deal_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    uses_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    uses_permissions.type = 'deal'
                                    AND uses_permissions.ref_id = main_sql.deal_id
                                    AND uses_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND uses_permissions.profileid IN (1200)
                            )
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql.customer_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    uses_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    uses_permissions.type = 'customer'
                                    AND uses_permissions.ref_id = main_sql.customer_id
                                    AND uses_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND uses_permissions.profileid IN (1200)
                            )
                        )
                    )

            UNION
            (
                SELECT
                    DISTINCT main_sql_dept.ref_id
                FROM
                    global_permissions as main_sql_dept
                    INNER JOIN uses_permissions AS P2 ON main_sql_dept.ref_id = P2.ref_id
                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                    LEFT JOIN activity AS A1 ON (A1.id = main_sql_dept.ref_id)
                WHERE
                    main_sql_dept.parentid = 6
                    AND main_sql_dept.type = 'activity'
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND A1.parentid = 6
                    AND (
                        A1.datetime <= '2022-12-20 23:59:59'
                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-20 00:00:00'
                    )
                    AND (
                        (
                            main_sql_dept.type = 'activity'
                            AND main_sql_dept.current_permission != 0
                            AND main_sql_dept.profileid IN (11980)
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql_dept.deal_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    global_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    global_permissions.type = 'deal'
                                    AND global_permissions.ref_id = main_sql_dept.deal_id
                                    AND global_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND global_permissions.profileid IN (11980)
                            )
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql_dept.customer_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    global_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    global_permissions.type = 'customer'
                                    AND global_permissions.ref_id = main_sql_dept.customer_id
                                    AND global_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND global_permissions.profileid IN (11980)
                            )
                        )
                    )
            )
        ) as `subaccessq` on `subaccessq`.`ref_id` = `activity`.`id`
    where
        `activity`.`isactive` = 1
        and (1 = 1)
        and `activity`.`parentid` = 6
    order by
        IF(
            ABS(
                TIMESTAMPDIFF(
                    DAY,
                    `activity`.`datetime`,
                    `activity`.`end_datetime`
                )
            ) > 0,
            1,
            0
        ) DESC,
        activity.datetime DESC,
        activity.id DESC
    limit
        7 offset 0
)

                    AND A2.isactive = 1

                    AND P2.parentid = 6

                    AND P2.current_permission = 2

                WHERE
                    main_sql.parentid = 6

                                    uses_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    uses_permissions.type = 'deal'
                                    AND uses_permissions.ref_id = main_sql.deal_id
                                    AND uses_permissions.child_permission != 0

                                WHERE

(
    select
        `activity`.`id`,
        `activity`.`opporid`,
        `activity`.`category`,
        `details`.`name`,
        `details`.`company`,
        `activity`.`alertpic`,
        `activity`.`datetime` as `start`,
        `activity`.`end_datetime` as `end`,
        `activity`.`notes` as `description`,
        `status`.`color`,
        `status`.`id` as `status_id`,
        IF(
            ABS(
                TIMESTAMPDIFF(
                    DAY,
                    `activity`.`datetime`,
                    `activity`.`end_datetime`
                )
            ) > 0,
            1,
            0
        ) as `is_long`
    from
        `activity`
        left join `opportunities` on `opportunities`.`id` = `activity`.`opporid`
        left join `details` on `details`.`id` = `opportunities`.`customer_id`
        left join `status` on `status`.`id` = `activity`.`status`

            (

                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                WHERE
                    U1.profileid IN (1200)
                    AND U1.parentid = 6
                    AND U1.type = 'activity'
                    AND U1.current_permission = 2
                    AND A1.parentid = 6
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND (
                        A1.datetime <= '2022-12-22 23:59:59'
                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-22 00:00:00'

            )

                SELECT

                    AND P2.parentid = 6

                    AND P2.current_permission = 2

                    LEFT JOIN activity as A1 ON (A1.id = main_sql.ref_id)
                WHERE
                    main_sql.parentid = 6
                    AND main_sql.type = 'activity'
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND A1.parentid = 6
                    AND (
                        A1.datetime <= '2022-12-22 23:59:59'
                        AND A1.end_datetime >= '2022-12-22 00:00:00'
                    )
                    AND (
                        (
                            main_sql.type = 'activity'
                            AND main_sql.current_permission != 0
                            AND main_sql.profileid IN (1200)
                        )
                        OR (
                            main_sql.deal_id IN (
                                SELECT
                                    ref_id
                                FROM
                                    uses_permissions
                                WHERE
                                    uses_permissions.type = 'deal'
                                    AND uses_permissions.ref_id = main_sql.deal_id
                                    AND uses_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND uses_permissions.profileid IN (1200)

                                SELECT

                                WHERE
                                    uses_permissions.type = 'customer'
                                    AND uses_permissions.ref_id = main_sql.customer_id
                                    AND uses_permissions.child_permission != 0
                                    AND uses_permissions.profileid IN (1200)

                        )

                    AND P2.parentid = 6
                    AND P2.type = 'activity'
                    AND P2.current_permission = 2
                    AND P2.profileid = 1200
                    LEFT JOIN activity AS A1 ON (A1.id = main_sql_dept.ref_id)
                WHERE
                    main_sql_dept.parentid = 6
                    AND main_sql_dept.type = 'activity'
                    AND A1.isactive = 1
                    AND A1.parentid = 6

table_meta.staging.activity:
CREATE TABLE `activity` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `parentid` int(11) NULL COMMENT "",
  `opporid_1` varchar(65533) NULL,
  `profileid` varchar(65533) NULL ,
  `notes` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `category_1` varchar(65533) NULL,
  `attachment` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `attachment_backup` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `status_1` varchar(65533) NOT NULL DEFAULT "6" COMMENT "status.id",
  `address` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "crm_customer_address.id",
  `pic` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "ASSIGNED EDIT USER",
  `pic_view` varchar(65533) NULL,
  `pic_edit` varchar(65533) NULL,
  `pic_chosen` varchar(65533) NULL,
  `pic_count` varchar(65533) NULL,
  `alertpic` varchar(65533) NULL,
  `completed_by` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `completed_date` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `isactive` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT "1" COMMENT "",
  `ishidden` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "",
  `update_log` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "no more use",
  `refid` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "unique seq no",
  `created_date` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `lastupdated` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `seq_no` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `referenceid` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `assign_child` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `end_datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `status` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `category` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `opporid` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `datediff_indicator` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "",
  `status_modification_date` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `last_comment_datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `last_alert_datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `customer_id` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `repeat_refid` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `source_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "",
  `source_type` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `unique_comment_categories` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `unique_comment_categories_bk` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT ""
) ENGINE=OLAP 
PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
COMMENT "OLAP"
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`id`) BUCKETS 6 
PROPERTIES (
"replication_num" = "1",
"in_memory" = "false",
"storage_format" = "DEFAULT",
"enable_persistent_index" = "true",
"compression" = "LZ4"
);
table_meta.staging.details:
CREATE TABLE `details` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `parentid` int(11) NULL COMMENT "",
  `contact_id` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `contact_sub_id` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `agent_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "accounts.id",
  `phone` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `phone_type` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `company` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `email` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `address` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `reference_code` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `device_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `sms_campaign` int(11) NULL DEFAULT "1" COMMENT "",
  `shared_to` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "USED AS A COUNTER TO DETERMINE IF CHECKBOX SHOULD BE GREY, GETS ITS VALUE FROM DEAL AND ACTIVITY",
  `full_shared_to` varchar(65533) NOT NULL COMMENT "ASSIGNED EDIT USER",
  `shared_to_view` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "ASSIGNED VIEW USER",
  `shared_to_chosen` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "NOT USED",
  `isactive` int(11) NULL DEFAULT "1" COMMENT "",
  `isactivenew` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT "1" COMMENT "",
  `phonelist` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "no more use",
  `created_date` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `lastupdated` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `add_data` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `emaillist` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "no more use",
  `reference_list` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "crm_reference.id as json format",
  `customer_deal_amount` double NOT NULL DEFAULT "0.00" COMMENT "total amt of deal",
  `customer_deal_category_list` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "deal category list as string",
  `customer_category` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "category list as json format",
  `customer_deal_assign` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "no more use",
  `customer_deal_view` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "no more use",
  `photo` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `seq_no` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `assign_child` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "Add grey and assign to all child",
  `customer_category_id` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `customer_status_id` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `default_deal_id` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT ""
) ENGINE=OLAP 
PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
COMMENT "OLAP"
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`id`) BUCKETS 2 
PROPERTIES (
"replication_num" = "1",
"in_memory" = "false",
"storage_format" = "DEFAULT",
"enable_persistent_index" = "true",
"compression" = "LZ4"
);
table_meta.staging.opportunities:
CREATE TABLE `opportunities` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `parentid` int(11) NULL COMMENT "",
  `profileid` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `customer_id2` varchar(65533) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `title` varchar(65533) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `description` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `deal_date` varchar(65533) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `amount` decimal64(15, 2) NULL DEFAULT "0.00" COMMENT "",
  `status` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "status.id",
  `category` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `category_list` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "crm_category.id as json format",
  `date` varchar(65533) NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `modifieddate` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT "",
  `isactive` int(11) NULL DEFAULT "1" COMMENT "",
  `refid` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "unique running no",
  `assigned_to` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "green assign",
  `assigned_to_view` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "green view",
  `assigned_to_edit` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "NOT USED ANYMORE",
  `assigned_to_chosen` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "NOT USED ANYMORE",
  `assigned_to_count` varchar(65533) NULL ,
  `alert_assigned` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "deal alert for user",
  `referenceid` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "link to crm_reference",
  `seq_no` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `assign_child` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `deal_category_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "",
  `customer_id` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `deal_end_datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `deal_start_datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `deal_completed_date` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `deal_status_change_date` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `deal_completed_by` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "",
  `def_ind` bigint(20) NULL DEFAULT "0" COMMENT "",
  `collection_balance` decimal64(15, 2) NULL DEFAULT "0.00" COMMENT "",
  `old_status` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "",
  `last_alert_datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `last_comment_datetime` datetime NULL COMMENT "",
  `collection` decimal64(15, 2) NULL DEFAULT "0.00" COMMENT "",
  `unique_comment_categories` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT ""
) ENGINE=OLAP 
PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
COMMENT "OLAP"
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`id`) BUCKETS 1 
PROPERTIES (
"replication_num" = "1",
"in_memory" = "false",
"storage_format" = "DEFAULT",
"enable_persistent_index" = "true",
"compression" = "LZ4"
);
